cause.description:
I am planning a project for my boy scout Eagle project. I need to rasie funds and carry out a project that benifits a school, church or community orginazation. I have chosen to create a memorial for the late Spencer Morrison on the Beaver Area High School campus. I have everything apporved by the correct people I just need to get money for project and goods. Any donations will be gladly accepted, just don't donate to the nonprofit organzation just contact me.
1. Remember a Great Teacher with a Memorial
cause.mission: Raise money for and Create a Memorial for Spencer Morrison
cause.name: Memorial for Spencer Morrison
